title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 250.7 - Record retention
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 250.7 - Record retention

State Regulations

Each business entity participating in the program shall
maintain all relevant records for the duration of its program participation
plus three years, and make such records available to the Department and its
agents upon seven days' notice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
250.7

Adopted

New

Amended

New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
